|type=wireless router |fcc_id=JCK-GN-WIAG |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model=MSP2006 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV160DB |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16800-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Gigabyte GN-WIAG |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5213A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=GIGABYTE |default_ssid_regex=^GIGABYTE$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:85 |oui_eth=00:14:85 }} {{TagLine|108 Mbps High-speed Wireless Broadband Router}} :[http://www.gigabyte.com/products/product-page.aspx?pid=943 Product page] (GPL code is available..){{•}} [http://download.gigabyte.eu/FileList/Manual/comm_gn-b49g_en_v6b.pdf Manual]
This device is noted on ''[https://dev.openwrt.org/wiki/Kaloz Kaloz]'''s [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=353 '''GIGABYTE''' product list thread on the '''OpenWrt Forums''']. :Notes the CPU as a '''Brecis''' MSP2006 @ 170MHz, RAM as being 2x '''ICSI''' IC42S16800-7T (32 MB), and the FE Switch as an '''IC+''' IP175A [https://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Brecis_SOC '''Brecis''' MSP200x SoCs are MMU-less. '''Gigabyte'''s latest FW has this running μClinux (kernel 2.4.20).] [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=4191 ''GN-B49G Hacking'' thread on the '''OpenWrt Forums'''] :2 MB Flash, presumed Am29LV160DB
Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''Gigabyte'''s manual.
==Reviews== *[http://www.neoseeker.com/Articles/Hardware/Reviews/GN-B49G/ On '''Neoseeker'''] (scored 8/10), dated 2004-05-25 :The power adapter shown is from '''Fairway Electronics'''. *[http://www.guru3d.com/articles_pages/gigabyte_108_mbit_wireless,1.html On '''Guru3D'''], dated 2004-03-05 :Notes the CPU as a '''Brecis''' MSP2006 ==Additional external links== *[http://ftp.rectron.co.za/support_tech22may06a.htm On '''rectron''' (label shot)] ('''South Africa'''n ISP) :00:14:85 OUIs, FCC ID is JCK-GN-WIAG ([[Gigabyte GN-WIAG]] Mini PCI module)
